title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is redrawn N times.
EB: The entire client area should not be redrawn multiple times when appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode.
SR: To reproduce the issue, add the following line to StyledText's performPaint method to observe the redraws: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
